casebody.data:
THOMAS W. HILL
v.
GARFORD TONY HILL, JEWEL ANNE HILL, and the ESTATE OF SADIE C. HILL No. 138P06 Supreme Court of North Carolina August 17, 2006

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 13th day of March 2006 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006.
Martin, J. and Timmons-Goodson, J. Recused.
